# ICT Group style skill

## Instructions
- Make sure the ICT Group logo is shown in the upper left corner of the HTML. Here the SVG for the logo:

- The colors and fonts are in ./main.css

## Brand Guidelines
- ICT Group uses a modern, professional look with blue (#00a0e3) as primary brand color
- Purple (#520a76) is used as secondary/accent color
- Green (#7ab800) is used for highlights and call-to-action elements
- The tagline is "Creating a smarter world"
- Clean, minimal design with ample white space
